name: E-commerce website
teconlogy: React js, tailwind css, Redux toolkit, Jwt, Nodejs, Expressjs, Mongodb, Stripe
decription:
• Customers can purchase any product By Login
  • Customers can login and register with email
  • Customers can pay with Stripe payment system
  • Every customer has a Dashboard and he can see his orders
  • customer can review any product
  • It has a dashboard . admin can manage this website

name: Social Media Application
teconlogy: Next js,Typescript, Shad cn,tailwind css, Redux toolkit,Socket io, Jwt, Nodejs, Express js, Mongodb, Mongoose
decription:
• Users can create account and visited website
  • user can create post,edit post and delete post
  • Users can like, comment and share other users
  • Users can add friend
  • It has a real-time chating application
  • It has a forget password functionality

name: Online Job Portal Website
teconlogy: Next js,Typescript, Shad cn,tailwind css, Redux toolkit,Jwt, Nodejs, Express js, Mongodb, Mongoose
decription:
• This is a fully functional and responsive website
  • Users can find their dream job and apply job
  • It has a searching,sorting,pagination functionality
  • Users can save their job
  • Company add their job ny find their employ

name: Multi Author Blog website
teconlogy: React js, chakra ui, Redux toolkit, Jwt, Nodejs, Express js, Mongodb, Stripe
decription:
• Users can read any blog with out login
  • Login users can add Blog
  • Every login user has a Dashboard. He can mange her blog
  • Login User can Like And comment every blog
  • If user forget her password than he can set new password
  • User can search blog and filter any blog
